title: Firebolt App Manifest: Distributor Config: Device SKUs Config

allowed.description: Array of device SKUs – If specified, the app may only execute on the defined Device SKUs.

disallowed.description: Array of device SKUs – If specified, the app may not execute on the defined Device SKUs. If a device SKU is somehow on both the allowed list and excluded list, the excluded list “wins”; the app should not execute on the Device SKU.
